titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring certain monies coyned in the kingdome of Ireland to be currant in this kingdome
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, this thirteenth day of October in the nineteenth yeare of our raigne. 1643."--Leaf [2].
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
